\chapter{Requirements}
\label{\detokenize{index:requirements}}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
The script is based on PyVisa. This package requires a VISA interface in the background (\sphinxhref{https://www.ni.com/de-de/support/downloads/drivers/download.ni-visa.html\#346210/}{NI\sphinxhyphen{}VISA download via: ni.com})

\item {} 
Driver for the GPIB\sphinxhyphen{}USB\sphinxhyphen{}interface (\sphinxhref{https://www.ni.com/de-de/support/downloads/drivers/download.ni-488-2.html\#345631/}{NI\sphinxhyphen{}488.2 download via: ni.com})

\end{itemize}


\chapter{measurement.py}
\label{\detokenize{index:module-measurement}}\label{\detokenize{index:measurement-py}}\index{module@\spxentry{module}!measurement@\spxentry{measurement}}\index{measurement@\spxentry{measurement}!module@\spxentry{module}}
Script to perform measurements for the characterization of nanoionic devices.
\index{measurement() (in module measurement)@\spxentry{measurement()}\spxextra{in module measurement}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:measurement.measurement}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{measurement.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{measurement}}}{\emph{\DUrole{n}{file\_set\_times}}, \emph{\DUrole{o}{**}\DUrole{n}{kwargs}}}{}
Performs measurements for the characterization of nanoionic memories using
a Keihtley 236.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{description}
\item[{\sphinxstylestrong{:param file\_set\_times: str}}] \leavevmode
The file location of an Excel file containing the individual set times.

\item[{\sphinxstylestrong{:key gpib\_address: int}}] \leavevmode
GPIB adress of the Keihtley 236. (Default is 16).

\item[{\sphinxstylestrong{:key compliance: str}}] \leavevmode
Compliance Value {[}A{]}. Scientific notation required e.g “1E\sphinxhyphen{}9” for 1nA.
(Default value is 1E\sphinxhyphen{}9).

\item[{\sphinxstylestrong{:key measurement\_delay: float}}] \leavevmode
Delay time {[}s{]} between applying the measuring voltage and the start of the measurement.
(Default value is 30).

\item[{\sphinxstylestrong{:key measurement\_range: str}}] \leavevmode
Measurement source\_range for the current. Allowed values are: Auto, 1nA, 10nA, 100nA,
1µA, 10µA, 100µA, 1mA, 10mA and 100mA. (Default value is 1nA).

\item[{\sphinxstylestrong{:key measurement\_voltage: float}}] \leavevmode
Applied voltage {[}V{]} during the measurement step. (Default value is 1).

\item[{\sphinxstylestrong{:key rest\_period: float}}] \leavevmode
Delay time {[}s{]} between the end of the measurement and the start of the next set pulse.
(Default value is 120).

\item[{\sphinxstylestrong{:key set\_voltage: float}}] \leavevmode
Applied voltage {[}V{]} during the set step. (Default value is 1).

\end{description}

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{read\_set\_times() (in module measurement)@\spxentry{read\_set\_times()}\spxextra{in module measurement}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:measurement.read_set_times}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{measurement.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{read\_set\_times}}}{\emph{\DUrole{n}{file}}}{}
Returns the first column of an Excel file as list.

\end{fulllineitems}

\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:SimpleKeithley236.Keithley236.Keithley236}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{class }}\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{SimpleKeithley236.Keithley236.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{Keithley236}}}{\emph{\DUrole{n}{gpib\_address}\DUrole{o}{=}\DUrole{default_value}{16}}, \emph{\DUrole{n}{compliance\_level}\DUrole{o}{=}\DUrole{default_value}{\textquotesingle{}1E\sphinxhyphen{}3\textquotesingle{}}}, \emph{\DUrole{n}{measurement\_range}\DUrole{o}{=}\DUrole{default_value}{\textquotesingle{}1mA\textquotesingle{}}}}{}
Minimal control interface (GPIB) for a Keihtley 236  for the
characterization of nano\sphinxhyphen{}ionic memories.
